# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit and add value to your endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, it is worth $1,200,000 to you. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I trust this investment will yield significant returns for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,100,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,100,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
